description: Solves the difficulty of understanding long-term climate trends by visualizing 125 years (1900-2025) of Norwegian historical weather data. Demonstrates real climate change through accessible heatmaps, charts, and station-specific analysis. Democratizes access to meteorological information from the Norwegian Meteorological Institute and helps communities understand local climate trends. Targets UN SDG 13 (Climate Action), SDG 4 (Quality Education), and SDG 17 (Partnerships for the Goals).
